testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check if window.cancelAnimationFrame is defined and not null.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check whether window.requestAnimationFrame can return a valid callback handle.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check if window.requestAnimationFrame is defined and not null.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: check if FrameRquestCallback ignores optional passed arguments

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check whether window.requestAnimationFrame can invoke second callback normally

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check whether window.requestAnimationFrame accepts inline script

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check whether FrameRequestCallback contains a valid timestamp

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: check if window.requestAnimationFrame performs callback when optional arguments are passed

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check whether window.cancelAnimationFrame can be used normally with invalid parameter boolean

step.expected: A blue box moves from left to right, when click Stop button, the blue box won't stop

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check whether window.cancelAnimationFrame can be used normally with invalid parameter string

step.expected: A blue box moves from left to right, when click Stop button, the blue box won't stop

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check whether window.cancelAnimationFrame can be used normally with invalid parameter undefined

step.expected: A blue box moves from left to right, when click Stop button, the blue box won't stop

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check whether window.cancelAnimationFrame can be used normally with invalid parameter negative number

step.expected: A blue box moves from left to right, when click Stop button, the blue box won't stop

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check window.cancelAnimationFrame can be called normally with the parameter returned by window.requestAnimationFrame

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check if window.cancelAnimationFrame and window.requestAnimationFrame invoked sucessfully

step.step_desc: Click the button Start and then click the button Stop
step.expected: A blue box will move from left to right while click the button Start. The blue box will stop while click the button Stop

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: check if window.requestAnimationFrame only schedules a single animation

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Performance and Optimization/Timing control for script-based animations
testcase.purpose: Check if document's hidden attribute is false, window.requestAnimationFrame invoked sucessfully
